{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3550734,"name":"ahuang","username":"ahuang","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/13edae/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-07T21:38:23.863Z","cooked":"

We are looking to implement soft limits on spark maxes this year, but we are having a hard time finding any python documentation on this.

We don’t know how to implement the soft limits.

Has anyone successfully implemented these soft limits using python? If so, could you please share the code?

Thank you!

The C++ example is going to be really close to the python version: REVLib-Examples/C++/SPARK/Limits/src/main/cpp/Robot.cpp at main · REVrobotics/REVLib-Examples · GitHub
